error_details.explanation: Incorrect operand. The variable 'initial_deposit' (value: 100) was used instead of 'interest_year1' (value: 10.0).

context.question: N/A
context.flawed_solution:
#### 241
After one year it earns $10 in interest because 100 x 0.1 = <<100*0.1=10>>10
It has $120 in it after a year because 100 + 100 + 10 = <<100+100+10=210>>210
In the second year it earns $12 in interest because 210 x 0.1 = <<210*0.1=21>>21
In the second year it has $142 in it because 210 + 21 + 10 = <<210+21+10=241>>241
